long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sky Note is a Google Chrome extension for taking notes. It can capture the web content and it is different from the general note taking application by automatically capturing the title and URL from the web page. It also provides the user to edit the title and URL after capturing automatically. Users can manually copy particular webpage sections and modify them as note body. The live search into the saved notes will make a better user experience here. Clicking a button makes it easy to view previously saved webpages for any specific note. For offline access flexibility, Sky note provides a functionality to download the note as a pdf file. This extension will significantly help users to improve their browser experience by pointing out web pages and content as noted. 

Overall, Users can install it because Sky Note streamlines the web browsing and note-taking experience, saving users time, boosting research efficiency, and promoting a more sustainable learning environment.
